text: Danger - Love at Work is a 1937 American romantic comedy movie directed by Otto Preminger and starring Ann Sothern, Jack Haley, Edward Everett Horton, Mary Boland, John Carradine, Walter Catlett, Benny Bartlett, Maurice Cass, Charles Coleman. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1937 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Otto Preminger
title: Danger - Love at Work
